code: import React,{Component}from'react';import List from'./List';import Dropdown from'react-bootstrap/Dropdown';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import'./FilteredList.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";class FilteredList extends Component{constructor(props){super(props);this.updateFilter=type=>{this.setState({filter:type});};this.updateSearch=event=>{this.setState({search:event.target.value});};this.filterItems=()=>{return this.props.items.filter(item=>(this.state.filter==='All'||item.type===this.state.filter)&&item.name.toLowerCase().includes(this.state.search.toLowerCase()));};this.state={filter:'All',search:''};}render(){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"filtered-list-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"search-filter-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"search-box",placeholder:"Search",onChange:this.updateSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown,{className:"dropdown-filter",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Toggle,{variant:"success",id:"dropdown-basic",children:"Filter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dropdown.Menu,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>this.updateFilter('All'),children:"All"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>this.updateFilter('Fruit'),children:"Fruit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dropdown.Item,{onClick:()=>this.updateFilter('Vegetable'),children:"Vegetable"})]})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(List,{items:this.filterItems()})]});}}export default FilteredList;
